languages.text: "Среди экипажа большие потери от взрывных разгерметизаций, прекращения подачи воздуха в отсеки, пожаров, сбоев транспортных систем. И потерь с каждой минутой становится все больше".

"The crew has suffered heavy casualties due to explosive depressurisation, loss of air supply to the compartments, multiple fires, and failures in the transportation systems. The numbers are getting worse by the minute."
languages.original_text: "Среди экипажа большие потери от взрывных разгерметизаций, прекращения подачи воздуха в отсеки, пожаров, сбоев транспортных систем. И потерь с каждой минутой становится все больше".

traits.locale_text: "The crew has suffered heavy losses from explosive depressurisation, loss of air supply to the compartments, multiple fires and failures of transportation systems. And the casualties are getting worse by the minute."

"The crew has suffered heavy losses from explosive depressurisation, loss of air supply to the compartments, multiple fires and failures of transportation systems. And the casualties are getting worse by the minute."

"The crew has suffered heavy casualties due to explosive depressurisation, loss of air supply to the compartments, multiple fires, and failures in the transportation systems. The numbers are getting worse by the minute."

"The crew has suffered heavy casualties due to explosive depressurisation, loss of air supply to the compartments, multiple fires, and failures in the transportation systems. The numbers are getting worse by the minute."

"The crew has suffered heavy casualties due to explosive depressurisation, loss of air supply to the compartments, multiple fires, and failures in the transportation systems. The numbers are getting worse by the minute."

languages.text: «La tripulación ha sufrido bajas considerables por la despresurización explosiva, la pérdida de aire en los compartimentos, los incendios y los fallos del sistema de transporte. La situación empeora por momentos».
languages.original_text: "The crew has suffered heavy casualties due to explosive depressurisation, loss of air supply to the compartments, multiple fires, and failures in the transportation systems. The numbers are getting worse by the minute."

traits.locale_text: «La tripulación ha sufrido bajas considerables por la despresurización explosiva, la pérdida de aire en los compartimentos, los incendios y los fallos del sistema de transporte. La situación empeora por momentos».

languages.text: 「爆発的な減圧、区画への空気供給経路の喪失、何度も起きる火災、輸送システムの不具合のせいで、クルーから多数の死傷者が出ています。刻一刻と、被害数はひどくなっています」
languages.original_text: "The crew has suffered heavy casualties due to explosive depressurisation, loss of air supply to the compartments, multiple fires, and failures in the transportation systems. The numbers are getting worse by the minute."

traits.locale_text: 「爆発的な減圧、区画への空気供給経路の喪失、何度も起きる火災、輸送システムの不具合のせいで、クルーから多数の死傷者が出ています。刻一刻と、被害数はひどくなっています」

languages.text: “由于爆炸失压、舱室空气供应中断、以及多处火灾与运输系统故障，船员遭受了惨重的损失。伤亡情况每分每秒都变得更加糟糕。”
languages.original_text: "The crew has suffered heavy casualties due to explosive depressurisation, loss of air supply to the compartments, multiple fires, and failures in the transportation systems. The numbers are getting worse by the minute."

traits.locale_text: “由于爆炸失压、舱室空气供应中断、以及多处火灾与运输系统故障，船员遭受了惨重的损失。伤亡情况每分每秒都变得更加糟糕。”

languages.text: "Die Crew hat durch den explosiven Druckabfall, durch den Ausfall der Luftversorgung in den Modulen, durch mehrere Brände und durch Zwischenfälle bei den Transportsystemen schwere Verluste erlitten. Die Zahlen werden von Minute zu Minute schlimmer."
languages.original_text: "The crew has suffered heavy casualties due to explosive depressurisation, loss of air supply to the compartments, multiple fires, and failures in the transportation systems. The numbers are getting worse by the minute."

traits.locale_text: "Die Crew hat durch den explosiven Druckabfall, durch den Ausfall der Luftversorgung in den Modulen, durch mehrere Brände und durch Zwischenfälle bei den Transportsystemen schwere Verluste erlitten. Die Zahlen werden von Minute zu Minute schlimmer."

languages.text: « L'équipage a subi de lourdes pertes suite à la dépressurisation provoquée par les explosions, la privation d'alimentation en oxygène de certains compartiments, de multiples incendies et des défaillances des systèmes de transport. Le bilan s'alourdit un peu plus chaque minute. »
languages.original_text: "The crew has suffered heavy casualties due to explosive depressurisation, loss of air supply to the compartments, multiple fires, and failures in the transportation systems. The numbers are getting worse by the minute."

traits.locale_text: « L'équipage a subi de lourdes pertes suite à la dépressurisation provoquée par les explosions, la privation d'alimentation en oxygène de certains compartiments, de multiples incendies et des défaillances des systèmes de transport. Le bilan s'alourdit un peu plus chaque minute. »
